sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT local_authority_name AS bin, SUM(population_count) AS frequency FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'White_British' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY local_authority_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Asian_Indian' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS x_value, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Asian_Indian' THEN percentage ELSE 0 END) AS y_value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
